content.query:
CREATE DATABASE demoDB
GO

USE demoDB
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Password01'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL myCredential
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2024-10-17T01:29:48Z&st=2024-10-16T17:29:48Z&spr=https&sig=ZhqOEZfBK9LyrTFj%2FPFxonE47L8a1Qw4G01fWVBqQ8s%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE myDataSource WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://lhadlsgen2storage.blob.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = myCredential
    )
